滍字的基本解释

滍
zhì
〔滍水〕古水名，即今中国河南省鲁山县、叶县境内的沙河。
〔滍阳〕地名，在中国河南省宝丰县南。

滍字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhì］
［《廣韻》直几切，上旨，澄。］
水名。即今河南省鲁山县、叶县境内的沙河。

滍字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　滍； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页642第22
【唐韻】【集韻】直几切【韻會】【正韻】丈几切，?音雉。水名。【說文】水出南陽魯陽堯山，東北入汝。　又【集韻】【韻會】或作泜。　又【集韻】丈里切，音峙。又直利切，音治。義?同。

滍字的起名意思

古水名，地名。

滍
Basic explanation of words
滍
zhì
[Shuishui] Ancient water name, namely Shahe River in Lushan County and Ye County, Henan Province, China.
[Shuyang] place name, south of Baofeng County, Henan Province, China.
滍
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhì］
["Guangyun" has been cut straight, with the purpose, and clear. ]
Water name. It is now Shahe in Lushan County and Ye County of Henan Province.
滍
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Volume 1] [Water Word Department] 　滍; Kangxi strokes: 14; Page number: page 642 22
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] How many straight cuts [Rhyme will] [Zheng Yun] How many cuts,? Yin pheasant. Water name. [Said the text] The water flows out of Nanyang Luyang Yaoshan, and the northeast enters Ru.　 [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] or Zuo Ming.　[Jiyun] Zhang Liqie, Yinzhi. And straight and sharp, Otoji. Righteous? Same.
